translation.en: Aah!
Netflix.
-[whirring] -Come on, guys, let's go!
-Yeah, whoo-hoo! -Yeah, dude!
♪ StoryBots ♪
♪ Livin' inside computer parts ♪
-♪ The StoryBots ♪ -[yelling]
♪ Helping kids get super smart ♪
translation.es: Ven a ver, que empieza ahora

translation.en: ♪ They love to learn Love to learn ♪
-♪ And adore adventure ♪ -Whoo-hoo!
♪ And answering questions Is their business and pleasure ♪
translation.es: Y su trabajo es responder Todas tus preguntas

translation.en: ♪ There's a whole department Whose only task ♪
♪ Is to answer anything we ask ♪
♪ So let's see if Team 341B Can solve another mystery ♪
-♪ The StoryBots ♪ -[all whooping]
♪ Meet Beep and Bing Bang, Boop and Bo ♪
translation.es: Son Bip y Bing, Bang, Bup y Bo

translation.en: ♪ Just ask them what you wanna know Just ask the StoryBots ♪
translation.es: Diles lo que quieres tú saber Llegó Storybots

translation.en: ♪ And when they get a stumper That demands investigation ♪
translation.es: Y cuando una pregunta Necesita algo de ayuda

translation.en: ♪ It's to the outer world On a hunt for information ♪
translation.es: Traerán la información Desde el mundo exterior

translation.en: ♪ StoryBots ♪
♪ Got a question? Got lots? ♪
♪ If something's got you baffled Worry not ♪
translation.es: Si es algo muy difícil de saber

translation.en: ♪ Just ask the StoryBots ♪
♪ Just ask the StoryBots ♪
Beethoven! Flatbread! Nova Scotia!
Huh? Whoa! I need to shave.
Clean me up, Sam.
Nah.
Nope.
Perfect! See you next week.
Too many questions. Not enough time.
Whoa, whoa, easy there.
-[beeping] -Holy Toledo! Who am I gonna get to answer that?
Oh, Hap! Hold that pose.
You look amazing in this light.
translation.es: Te ves increíble con esta luz.

translation.en: I-I do?
I mean, quit your dilly-dallying!
-We got work to-- -Hey, Hap! Hold this!
Oh, and this. Oh, and wear this!
I don't have time for dress-up! We've got quest--
translation.es: ¡No hay tiempo para esto! Tenemos preguntas...

translation.en: Hey, Hap? Could you turn your head a little to the right?
translation.es: Hap, ¿girarías la cabeza un poco a la derecha?

translation.en: -Like this? -[Beep] Perfect!
Time's up, StoryBots!
[Beep] We're done, boss. Check it out!
[Hap] Ooh, not bad. Nice.
Holy cow, look at that!
All right, enough artin' around. We've got a question to answer.
translation.es: Bueno, suficiente arte. Tenemos una pregunta que responder.

translation.en: Hi, Storybots. My name is Mya.
-Hey, Mya, how're you doing? -Hi, there!
I have a question for you.
How do you make music?
Hmm, that's a tough one.
How do you make music?
Well, do you know how to play any instruments, Mya?
I play the piano.
Wow, really? Can you play the banjo?
Yes.
Whoa, what about the drums?
Yes.
-A glockenspiel? -A sousaphone?
A B-flat triple piston, brass-plated flugelhorn?
translation.es: ¿El fliscorno en si bemol de tres cilindros?

translation.en: N... Yes.
So, what do you need us for?
Bing, just because Mya can play music doesn't mean she knows how it's made.
translation.es: Bing, solo porque Mya pueda tocar música no significa que sepa cómo se hace.

translation.en: -Oh, yeah, you're right. -I didn't think about that.
translation.es: - Sí, tienes razón. - No pensé en eso.

translation.en: [gasps] Hey, wait, I got it! I know where we can find the answer!
translation.es: Oigan, ¡ya está! Ya sé dónde hallar la respuesta.

translation.en: StoryBots, prepare for transport.
Let's find out how you make music.
translation.es: Averigüemos cómo se hace la música.

translation.en: [all] Outer World, here we come!
Almost, mm... Ahh.
Perfect.
Painting.
[gasps] Oh, Bing, this was a great idea.
[Bing] Yeah, where better to learn about music than a music shop?
translation.es: Sí, ¿qué lugar mejor que una tienda de música?

translation.en: All we have to do is play an instrument, and we'll have our answer.
translation.es: Solo debemos tocar un instrumento y tendremos la respuesta.

translation.en: Bing, I don't think it's that simple-- -[oboe blaring] -[all yelling]
translation.es: No creo que sea tan simple.

translation.en: Oh, that did not sound like music, man.
translation.es: Eso no sonó como música, viejo.

translation.en: Well, feast your ears on this.
translation.es: Bueno, deleiten sus oídos con esto.

translation.en: Hmm. Music's gotta come out of one of these.
translation.es: Alguno de estos debe hacer música.

translation.en: Why won't these make music?
I don't know, man.
This seems, like, mega difficult. [strums]
That sounds like music!
Whoa, Bing, how'd you do that?
Just naturally talented, I guess.
Look! A music thingy!
Come on, guys, let's follow it and see where it goes.
translation.es: Vamos, chicos, sigámosla y veamos a dónde va.

translation.en: -Yeah, come on, guys! -Let's do it!
Hey, look! It's going down the tuba. All right!
translation.es: - ¡Miren! Va bajando por la tuba. - ¡Muy bien!

translation.en: [Bang] I don't think we're in the tuba anymore, dudes.
translation.es: No creo que estemos en la tuba, amigos.

translation.en: Look! There's more of those music thingies.
translation.es: ¡Miren! Hay más de esas cositas musicales.

translation.en: Why are we just standing around? Come on, guys, follow me! Let's g--
You'll never get into Music Land ringing the bells like that.
translation.es: Nunca entrarán en la Tierra de la Música tocando las campanas así.

translation.en: [all] Music Land?
Is there an echo?
Could you tell us how to get into Music Land, Mr. Horn Thingy?
It's easy. Just ring the bells to climb the wall.
translation.es: Es fácil. Toquen las campanas para escalar el muro.

translation.en: You mean, like this?
No, no, no. You can't make just any noise.
translation.es: No, no. No pueden hacer cualquier ruido.

translation.en: It needs to be a melody that [in different pitches] gets you over the wall.
translation.es: Tiene que ser una melodía que los haga subir por el muro.

translation.en: Melody, huh? What's melody?
Melody is a string of pitches you can sing along with.
translation.es: Una melodía es una serie de tonos con los que puedes cantar.

translation.en: Pitches? What are those?
[high-pitched] Pitch is how high a sound is.
translation.es: El tono es qué tan agudo es un sonido.

translation.en: [low-pitched] Or how low a sound is.
So, if pitch is how high or low a sound is,
translation.es: Si el tono es qué tan agudo o grave es un sonido

translation.en: and melody is a string of pitches,
translation.es: y la melodía es una serie de tonos,

translation.en: then, to get over this high wall,
maybe we need to play a melody that gets higher in pitch.
translation.es: podríamos tocar una melodía que sea cada vez más aguda.

translation.en: Like this.
The melody is making more of those music thingies!
translation.es: La melodía está haciendo más de esas cositas musicales.

translation.en: Those aren't "music thingies." They're music notes.
translation.es: No son cositas musicales. Son notas musicales.

translation.en: Well, whatever they are, they're making stairs. Come on, guys, let's go!
translation.es: Sean lo que sean, sirven de escaleras. ¡Vamos, chicos!

translation.en: -There we go. -Whoa.
Oh, hey, look! It's the castle!
That's right! Just follow the path to the King of Music.
translation.es: ¡Eso es! Solo sigan el camino hacia el rey de la música.

translation.en: [all] King of Music?
[gasps] I bet he can help us answer Mya's question.
translation.es: Seguro puede ayudarnos con la pregunta de Mya.

translation.en: Of course, he can. He's a living legend.
translation.es: Claro que puede. Es una leyenda viviente.

translation.en: But you better stay on the path. You don't wanna get... [low-pitched] lost.
translation.es: Pero será mejor que sigan el camino. No querrán... perderse.

translation.en: -[laughing] -Thank you so much, Mr. Horn!
-Bye! -See ya!
Package from the Philharmonic Orchestra.
Instruments.
♪ From the great, big grand piano To the tiny tin kazoo ♪
translation.es: Del gran piano de cola Al kazoo de hojalata

translation.en: ♪ There are tons and tons of instruments Let's try and name a few ♪
translation.es: Hay toneladas de instrumentos Nombrar algunos intentaremos

translation.en: ♪ There's the xylophone The slide trombone ♪
translation.es: Ahí está el xilófono Y el trombón

translation.en: ♪ The banjo with its snappy twang The bongo drums are fun to bang ♪
translation.es: El banjo y su tañido Los bongos divertidos

translation.en: ♪ The violin, the theremin ♪
♪ The ukulele by the bay So many instruments to play ♪
translation.es: El ukelele en la playa Hay tantos instrumentos

translation.en: ♪ The clarinet, the little coronet ♪
♪ The tuba with its oompah sound The crashing cymbals, big and round ♪
translation.es: La tuba con su sonido grave Los platillos grandes

translation.en: ♪ The bagpipe too, the didgeridoo ♪
♪ The ocarina made of clay So many instruments to play ♪
translation.es: La ocarina hecha de arcilla Hay tantos instrumentos

translation.en: ♪ Some people like to Strum the balalaika ♪
translation.es: A algunos les gusta rasgar la balalaica

translation.en: ♪ Some like to play The ringing harpsichord ♪
translation.es: A otros les gusta el clavicordio

translation.en: ♪ Harmonica, musical saw And the gigantic alpine horn ♪
translation.es: Armónica, sierra musical El cuerno alpino es un titán

translation.en: ♪ The guitar, the harp, the piccolo The double bass, the diddley bow ♪
translation.es: Guitarra, arpa, piccolo Contrabajo, arco de diddley

translation.en: ♪ The pan pipes and the timpani The French horn, the calliope ♪
translation.es: Flauta de pan y timbal Cuerno francés, el calíope

translation.en: ♪ The glockenspiel, the bells, the gong ♪
♪ And many more not in this song ♪
♪ What a lot of sounds, hooray So many instruments to play ♪
translation.es: Cuántos sonidos, qué genial Hay muchos instrumentos más

translation.en: Oh, I can't wait to meet the King of Music.
translation.es: Ansío conocer al rey de la música.

translation.en: Well, as long as we follow the path, we should be there in no ti--
translation.es: Siempre y cuando sigamos el camino, deberíamos llegar...

translation.en: [Bang] That's a pretty big hole, man.
How will we ever make it across?
[two voices] We can show you how.
-It's easy. -Watch.
Hey! Hey, come here! You're not getting away this time.
translation.es: ¡Oye! ¡Ven aquí! Esta vez no te escaparás.

translation.en: Ha, this is fun!
As you can see,
a single pitch all by itself can only take you so far.
translation.es: una sola nota solamente puede llevarlos un poco.

translation.en: But in order to get that extra oomph,
you need to use some harmony.
Harmony? What's that?
Harmony's what you get when you combine two or more pitches.
translation.es: Armonía es lo que se obtiene al combinar dos o más notas.

translation.en: To create a sound that's pleasing.
translation.es: Para crear un sonido que es agradable.

translation.en: [both] Like this.
-Whoa! -So cool!
That sounds beautiful.
Whoa, the music notes are, like, heading to the other side.
translation.es: Las notas musicales van hacia el otro lado.

translation.en: Grab on, guys!
Thank you, Mr. and Mrs. Recorder! We appreciate the help!
translation.es: ¡Gracias, señor y señora Flauta! ¡Les agradecemos la ayuda!

translation.en: Whoa, it's, like, super breezy up here, man.
I just wish we were a little closer to the ground.
translation.es: Ojalá estuviéramos un poco más cerca del suelo.

translation.en: Like a lot closer to the ground. [gulps]
It's OK, Bo, just look around.
translation.es: Tranquila, Bo, mira a tu alrededor.

translation.en: It's so nice and peaceful.
Yeah, what could possibly go wrong?
-[loudly] Hello! -[all] Aah!
Oopsy daisy!
Whoa, that was, like, intense, man.
This place is giving me the creeps.
Well, at least we're on the ground, right?
translation.es: Bueno, al menos, estamos en el suelo, ¿no?

translation.en: Yeah! Besides, everything should be fine, as long as we stay on the--
translation.es: ¡Sí! Además, todo estará bien mientras sigamos el...

translation.en: Uh, where's the path?
-[rustling] -Oh! What's that?
[rhythmically] Tap you feet to the beat. That's rhythm.
translation.es: Mueve los pies al compás. Es el ritmo.

translation.en: Tap our what?
[rhythmically] Add a pause, that's because it's rhythm.
translation.es: Una pausa porque así es el ritmo.

translation.en: Do you happen to know how to get to the castle?
[rhythmically] When you go fast or slow, that's tempo.
translation.es: Si vas rápido o lento, eso es el tiempo.

translation.en: Follow me, and you'll see where to go.
Short, short, long. Short, short, long. That's rhythm.
translation.es: Corto, corto, largo. Corto, corto, largo. Ese es el ritmo.

translation.en: Uh, is this guy making sense to any of you?
What is it, Boop?
Short, short, long. Short, short, long. That's rhythm.
translation.es: Corto, corto, largo. Corto, corto, largo. Ese es el ritmo.

translation.en: [all] Short, short, long. Short, short, long. That's rhythm.
translation.es: Corto, corto, largo. Corto, corto, largo. Ese es el ritmo.

translation.en: Short, short, long. Short, short, long. That's rhythm.
translation.es: Corto, corto, largo. Corto, corto, largo. Ese es el ritmo.

translation.en: Short, short, long. Short, short, long. That's rhy--
translation.es: Corto, corto, largo. Corto, corto, largo. Ese es...

translation.en: Guys! Look!
[gasps] It's the castle!
What are we waiting for? Let's go!
-Whoo-hoo! -Thank you! Thank you, Mr. Drum!
I can't believe we're finally gonna meet the King of Music.
translation.es: No puedo creerlo, al fin conoceremos al rey de la música.

translation.en: Yeah! I hope he's, like, all benevolent and stuff.
translation.es: ¡Sí! Espero que sea benevolente y esas cosas.

translation.en: -[three voices] Halt! -Huh?
To see the King of Music, you must get past us first.
translation.es: Para ver al rey de la música, deben pasar por nosotros primero.

translation.en: Only those familiar with the musical element "timbre" are allowed entry!
translation.es: Solo quienes sepan qué es el elemento musical timbre pueden entrar.

translation.en: OK! Well, uh... What's timbre?
Timbre is the quality of sound.
translation.es: El timbre es la calidad del sonido.

translation.en: Shh, Jerry, don't tell them!
Timbre is what makes one sound different from another.
translation.es: Timbre es lo que distingue un sonido de otro.

translation.en: Garry, quiet!
Kind of like how this...
Has a different timbre than this.
translation.es: Tiene un timbre diferente a esto.

translation.en: No, you're giving everything away!
We're guards! We're supposed to guard the castle!
So, this... [claps]
...has a different timbre than this? [knocks]
And this? [honks]
And ♪ this! ♪
Ah, now look what you two have done.
[sighs] Very well, just come on in.
-Thank you so, so much. Thanks, guys! -Thanks, gang!
Bye, Garry! Bye, Larry! Bye, Jerry! Bye-bye!
I don't mean to brag, but I think we are pretty great guards.
translation.es: No quiero presumir, pero creo que somos muy buenos guardias.

translation.en: You know what they say. Three heads are better than one.
translation.es: Ya conoces el dicho: tres cabezas piensan mejor que una.

translation.en: Ugh. Nobody says that.
[man] And now, presenting...
Hercules! The world's strongest StoryBot.
translation.es: Y ahora presentamos a... Hércules, el Storybot más fuerte del mundo.

translation.en: [grunts] One!
[grunts] Two!
[Hercules, weakly] Three.
Three.
♪ How many rings in a circus tent? And how many holes in a bowling ball? ♪
translation.es: ¿Cuántos anillos hay en un circo? ¿Y cuántos agujeros en una bola?

translation.en: ♪ How many corners in a triangle? Everybody knows there are three in all ♪
translation.es: ¿Cuántos ángulos hay en un triángulo?  Todos saben que hay tres

translation.en: ♪ Three little wheels go round and round When a tricycle goes zippin' by ♪
translation.es: Tres ruedas dan vueltas Cuando un triciclo pasa volando

translation.en: ♪ Three little pigs have a house of bricks ♪ ♪ And three little kittens have their pie ♪
translation.es: Tres cerditos tienen una casa Y tres gatitos comen pastel

translation.en: ♪ Three-minute eggs are cookin' Three strikes you're out ♪
translation.es: Estos huevos se hacen en tres minutos Con tres strikes, te vas

translation.en: ♪ The number three is such a thrill It makes me wanna shout ♪
translation.es: El número tres es tan genial Me hace querer gritar

translation.en: ♪ Hip-hip hooray, hip-hip hooray Hip-hip hooray ♪
translation.es: Hip hip hurra, hip hip hurra Hip hip hurra

translation.en: ♪ Three cheers for three ♪
♪ Hip-hip hooray Three cheers for three ♪
translation.es: Hip hip hurra Tres hurras por el tres

translation.en: ♪ Triceratops has three big horns Three musketeers yell "All for one!"♪
translation.es: El tricerátops tres cuernos tiene Tres mosqueteros gritan ¡Todos para uno!

translation.en: ♪ When your ice cream's got three flavors That's called Neapolitan ♪
translation.es: Cuando tu helado tiene tres sabores Se llama napolitano

translation.en: ♪ Goldilocks she met three bears Columbus had three ships at sea ♪
translation.es: Ricitos de Oro conoció a tres osos Y Colón tenía tres barcos

translation.en: ♪ A genie grants three magic wishes Old King Cole had fiddlers three ♪
translation.es: Un genio tres deseos da Este viejo rey tiene tres músicos

translation.en: ♪ Three-colored traffic lights Mean stop or wait or go ♪
translation.es: Tres colores en el semáforo Para, espera o avanza

translation.en: ♪ The number three just tickles me I gotta let it show ♪
translation.es: Es que el tres me hace cosquillas No puedo evitar esta dicha

translation.en: ♪ Hip-hip hooray, hip-hip hooray Hip-hip hooray ♪
translation.es: Hip hip hurra, hip hip hurra Hip hip hurra

translation.en: ♪ Three cheers for three ♪
♪ Hip-hip hooray Three cheers for three ♪
translation.es: Hip hip hurra Tres hurras por el tres

translation.en: ♪ Hip-hip hooray, hip-hip hooray Three cheers for three ♪
translation.es: Hip hip hurra, hip hip hurra Tres hurras por el tres

translation.en: Hello? Mr. King?
-Hello? -[Bing] Anybody home?
Only those who know the elements of music may seek counsel from the king!
translation.es: Solo quienes conozcan los elementos de la música pueden pedir consejo al rey.

translation.en: I don't think I know the elements of music.
translation.es: No creo que conozca los elementos.

translation.en: I don't think I do either.
Guys, we learned them on the way here, remember?
translation.es: Chicos, los aprendimos en el camino, ¿recuerdan?

translation.en: There was melody.
Oh, yeah, and harmony!
-And don't forget rhythm! -Oh, and timbre!
translation.es: - ¡Y no se olviden del ritmo! - ¡Y el timbre!

translation.en: And what about... intensity?
Uh, what about intensity?
You know.
[emphatically] Intensity!
Uh... It's not ringing a bell, dude.
Really, Mike? That was your one job.
translation.es: ¿En serio, Mike? Era lo único que tenías que hacer.

translation.en: [loudly] Sorry, boss!
I guess if you want something done, you've got to do it yourself.
translation.es: Si quieres que algo se haga bien, debes hacerlo tú mismo.

translation.en: So, musically speaking, intensity is the volume of sound.
translation.es: Bien, en la música, la intensidad es el volumen del sonido.

translation.en: With it, things can be very soft.
translation.es: Con eso, las cosas pueden sonar muy suaves.

translation.en: [loudly] Or very loud!
Now, what was that element?
[all] Intensity.
I can't hear you!
[all louder] Intensity!
A little bit louder!
[all louder] Intensity!
Oh, wait! That's too intense! Oh, no!
Darn that Gary and his discounted electronics.
translation.es: Maldito Gary y su electrónica de oferta.

translation.en: Well, it sure looks like you all know your elements of music.
translation.es: Parece que todos conocen los elementos de la música.

translation.en: I mean, look at what you've done here!
Yeah, sorry about that.
I guess we just got a little carried away.
translation.es: Supongo que nos dejamos llevar un poco.

translation.en: Ah, that's all right, because I know the one secret to getting these elements back in shape.
translation.es: Está bien, conozco el secreto para acomodar estos elementos.

translation.en: What's that, Mr. King of Music?
translation.es: ¿Cuál es, señor rey de la música?

translation.en: Organization!
You see, without organization,
sounds are just noise.
But when melody, harmony, rhythm, timbre and intensity
translation.es: Pero cuando la melodía, la armonía, el ritmo, el timbre y la intensidad

translation.en: are organized in a way that makes people feel things...
translation.es: se organizan de forma tal que la gente sienta cosas...

translation.en: that's music.
-[all] Oh! -That's music!
In fact, music can make you feel all sorts of things.
translation.es: De hecho, la música puede hacer sentir todo tipo de cosas.

translation.en: It can make you feel happy.
[feigns crying] Or sad.
Or anything in between.
translation.es: O cualquier cosa en el medio.

translation.en: This one makes me feel groovy, man.
translation.es: Esto me hace sentir estupendo, amigo.

translation.en: This one makes me feel excited!
And this one makes me feel like dancing.
translation.es: Y esto me da ganas de bailar.

translation.en: Precisely.
So you see, StoryBots, you don't need to be royalty to know how to make music.
translation.es: Como verán, no necesitan ser de la realeza para saber hacer música.

translation.en: All you need are the five elements and a little bit of organization!
translation.es: Solo necesitan los cinco elementos y un poco de organización.

translation.en: Well, it looks like we got our answer, guys!
-Whoo-hoo! -We did it!
-Oh, I love it! -Thank you, Mr. King!
[chanting] Thank you, King of Music!
[all] Thank you, King of Music! Whoo! Thank you, King of Music! Hey!
translation.es: ¡Gracias, rey de la música! ¡Gracias, rey de la música!

translation.en: [robotic voice] StoryBot fun fact number 107,476,092.
translation.es: MÁQUINA DE CURIOSIDADES STORYBOT Curiosidad Storybot número 107.476.092.

translation.en: Did you know that a chicken's heart beats four times as fast as a human
translation.es: ¿Sabías que a una gallina el corazón le late cuatro veces más rápido que a un humano y diez que a una tortuga?

translation.en: and ten times faster than a turtle?
translation.es: le late cuatro veces más rápido que a un humano y diez que a una tortuga?

translation.en: Mm-hmm, mm-hmm, mm-hmm. Perfect.
-[monitor beeping slowly] -Uh-huh, uh-huh, huh. Perfect.
-[monitor beeping rapidly] -Oh, wait! Wait, wait! No, no, no! Wait, wait! No! No, no, no, no! Wait! No!
Ah. Perfect.
♪ Bob your beak to the beat ♪
♪ Just bob your beak to the beat ♪
♪ Come on, bob your beak to the beat ♪
translation.es: Vamos, mueve tu pico al son

translation.en: ♪ Let's all bob our beaks to the beat ♪
translation.es: Todos, muevan su pico al son

translation.en: ♪ What's up then I'm hanging in this chicken pen ♪
translation.es: Hola, ¿qué tal? Aquí estoy, en mi corral

translation.en: ♪ I'm a female chicken So call me a hen ♪
translation.es: Soy una gallina hembra Así que ten cuidado

translation.en: -♪ Don't call me a chick ♪ -♪ Nah ♪
♪ That's a little baby ♪
♪ A male is a rooster ♪
-Yo, call me, girl! -♪ Maybe ♪
♪ We all got wings Which make us look fly ♪
translation.es: Todos tenemos alas Nos quedan genial

translation.en: ♪ But chickens can't fly As hard as we try ♪
translation.es: Pero no volamos Y mira que intentamos

translation.en: ♪ And what are these things on top of our domes ♪
translation.es: ¿Y qué son estas cosas En la cabeza?

translation.en: -♪ They help us stay cool ♪ -♪ And we call 'em combs ♪
translation.es: - Nos mantienen frescas - Se llaman crestas

translation.en: ♪ Our hearts beat four times faster than yours ♪
translation.es: Mi corazón late más rápido que el tuyo

translation.en: ♪ When we walk We bob our heads back and forth ♪
♪ When we talk We cluck ♪ ♪ We cluckin' at you ♪
-♪ And the roosters in the morning go ♪ -♪ Cock-a-doo-dle-do ♪
translation.es: - Y los gallos temprano - Cantan cocorocó

translation.en: ♪ But the best thing about us? Look under my legs ♪
translation.es: ¿Y qué es lo mejor? Mira mis patas

translation.en: ♪ Us female chickens, we can lay eggs ♪
translation.es: Las que ponen huevos Son solo las damas

translation.en: ♪ Eggs that you eat Others for hatching ♪
translation.es: Algunos se comen Otro se incuban

translation.en: ♪ I'm a tiny new chick What's up, man, what's crackin' ♪
translation.es: Acabo de llegar Viejo, qué locura

translation.en: ♪ Eggs can be white or brown or blue ♪
translation.es: Los huevos son blancos Café o azules

translation.en: ♪ I lay one egg a day, this is a cow ♪
translation.es: Pongo un huevo al día Esto es una vaca

translation.en: ♪ We eat bugs, seeds, veggies And wheat ♪
translation.es: Comemos bichos, semillas Vegetales y trigo

translation.en: ♪ Now bob your beak To the freaky fresh beat ♪
translation.es: Ahora con este ritmo Pon a mover tu pico

translation.en: -♪ Bob your beak to the beat ♪ -♪ Come on ♪
translation.es: - Mueve tu pico al son - Anda

translation.en: -♪ Just bob your beak to the beat ♪ -♪ Everybody now ♪
translation.es: - Mueve tu pico al son - Todos

translation.en: -♪ Bob your beak to the beat ♪ -♪ Buk-buk-buk ♪
translation.es: - Mueve tu pico al son - Cloc, cloc

translation.en: ♪ Bob your beaks to the beat ♪
Hush puppies! Couch potato! Packing peanuts!
-[whirring] -What the--
What are you StoryBots doing back here? I told you to get an answer! Not dilly-dally!
translation.es: ¿Qué hacen aquí, Storybots? ¡Les pedí una respuesta, no que bobearan!

translation.en: We got the answer, boss. We know how you make music.
translation.es: ¡Tenemos la respuesta, jefe! Sabemos cómo se hace la música.

translation.en: The first thing you need to know is that all music is made up of sounds.
translation.es: Lo primero que hay que saber es que toda música se compone de sonidos.

translation.en: Yeah, but not all sounds are music. Some are just plain noise.
translation.es: Pero no todos son música. Algunos son ruido.

translation.en: For sounds to be music,
translation.es: Para que los sonidos sean música,

translation.en: they need to be organized in a way that makes people feel something.
translation.es: deben estar organizados de forma tal que la gente sienta algo.

translation.en: Like happy, sad, nervous, scared.
Or maybe just makes you wanna tap your toes, man.
translation.es: O tal vez te hace querer mover los pies.

translation.en: There are five ways people organize sounds to make music.
translation.es: Hay cinco formas de organizar los sonidos para hacer música:

translation.en: Melody, harmony, rhythm, timbre, and intensity.
translation.es: la melodía, la armonía, el ritmo, el timbre y la intensidad.

translation.en: Melody is a string of pitches you can sing along with.
translation.es: La melodía es una serie de tonos con los que puedes cantar.

translation.en: And pitch is how high or low a sound is.
translation.es: Y el tono es qué tan agudo o grave es un sonido.

translation.en: Harmony is when multiple pitches are played at the same time.
translation.es: La armonía son varios tonos que se tocan a la vez.

translation.en: And rhythm is the way sounds repeat over time.
translation.es: Y el ritmo es cómo los sonidos se repiten en el tiempo.

translation.en: Timbre is what makes one thing sound different from another.
translation.es: El timbre hace que una cosa suene diferente a otra.

translation.en: And intensity is how loud or soft the sounds are played.
translation.es: Y la intensidad es lo fuerte o lo suave que suena el sonido.

translation.en: So, when melody, harmony, rhythm, timbre, and intensity
translation.es: Cuando melodía, armonía, ritmo, timbre e intensidad

translation.en: are organized in a way that make people feel something...
translation.es: se organizan de manera que la gente sienta algo...

translation.en: [all] That's how you make music.
Just-- Just give me that tape.
♪ Melody, harmony, rhythm Timbre, intensity ♪
♪ That's how sound is arranged to be ♪
translation.es: Así se organiza el sonido para ser

translation.en: ♪ Music to our ears ♪
♪ Let's start with pitch ♪
♪ An important part of music ♪
translation.es: Una parte importante de la música

translation.en: ♪ It can be high or low ♪
♪ Let me show you how to use it ♪
♪ You make melody ♪
♪ A string of pitches One after the other ♪
translation.es: Una serie de tonos Uno tras otro

translation.en: ♪ And harmony a group of pitches Playing altogether ♪
translation.es: Y armonía, un grupo de tonos Que suenan a la vez

translation.en: ♪ And then you got rhythm ♪ ♪ Rhythm ♪
♪ The way a sound repeats ♪ ♪ It might make you tap your toes ♪
translation.es: El modo en que se repite el sonido Te hará mover los pies

translation.en: ♪ It might make you tap, tap Tap, tap, toe ♪
translation.es: Te hará mover, mover los pies

translation.en: ♪ And timbre, what makes one sound Different from another ♪
translation.es: Y el timbre Lo que distingue Un sonido de otro

translation.en: ♪ I'll show you how that goes ♪
♪ And at last, intensity How loud or soft a sound is played ♪
translation.es: Por último, la intensidad Qué tan fuerte o suave es un sonido

translation.en: ♪ Now you know How sound is organized into music ♪
translation.es: Ya sabes cómo se organiza El sonido para hacer música

translation.en: ♪ Made of melody, harmony Rhythm, timbre, intensity ♪
translation.es: Tiene melodía, armonía Ritmo, timbre, intensidad

translation.en: ♪ Gets our feelings flowing Our hummers humming ♪
translation.es: Los sentimientos fluyen La gente tararea

translation.en: ♪ Our fingers drumming, everybody ♪
♪ Melody, harmony Rhythm, timbre, intensity ♪
♪ That's how sound is arranged to be Music to our ears ♪
translation.es: Así se organiza el sonido para ser Música para nuestros oídos

translation.en: Oh, that was actually kind of groovy.
translation.es: Vaya. De hecho, eso sonaba muy bien.

translation.en: -Hey! Way to go, guys! -Wee! We got an answer!
translation.es: - Sí, eso es, chicos. - ¡Tenemos la respuesta!

translation.en: Hey, guys, look! It's Mya!
-Hi, Mya! -Hey! Hey, Mya! Hi!
So, Mya, what do you think?
Wow, StoryBots! Music is the coolest!
translation.es: Cielos, Storybots, ¡la música es lo máximo!

translation.en: Yeah, it sure is.
Let's have a dance party!
[all] Dance party!
Great idea! Hit it, Boop!
[techno music playing] ♪ Let's have a dance party ♪
♪ Dance party, dance party ♪
♪ Let's have a dance party ♪
That's enough moving and shaking, StoryBots! These questions won't answer themselves!
translation.es: ¡Basta de menear, Storybots! ¡Las preguntas no se responden solas!

translation.en: Stop bopin' around! Get back to work!
-[Hap] Go! Go! Move! Move! Move! Now! -Bye, boss.
♪ StoryBots ♪
♪ Livin' inside computer parts ♪
♪ The StoryBots ♪
♪ Helping kids get super smart ♪
translation.es: Ven a ver, que empieza ahora

translation.en: ♪ They love to learn Love to learn ♪
♪ And adore adventure ♪
♪ And answering questions Is their business and pleasure ♪
translation.es: Y su trabajo es responder Todas tus preguntas

translation.en: ♪ There's a whole department Whose only task ♪
♪ Is to answer anything we ask ♪
♪ So let's see if Team 341B Can solve another mystery ♪
♪ The StoryBots ♪
♪ Meet Beep and Bing Bang, Boop, and Bo ♪
translation.es: Son Bip y Bing, Bang, Bup y Bo

translation.en: ♪ Just ask them what you wanna know Just ask the StoryBots ♪
translation.es: Diles lo que quieres tú saber Llegó Storybots
